name: Warp Lab Mixed Reality
summary: Warp Lab Mixed Reality invites you to transform your home into a dynamic playground of possibilities. Unleash the power of portals in your very own living space, opening doorways to dimensions that defy reality. Experiment with portal physics across 8 unique and challenging puzzle scenarios that require careful use of portals to correctly solve. Since the game uses your real-world environment, no two playthroughs are ever the same.
